column5: MSc Business Analytics will equip the learners with the techniques and analytical tools required to understand and engage with complex data with the aim of enhancing business performance. This business analytics masters programme has been designed to help learners gain the skills and qualification needed to pursue a career in business analytics.Business analytics is an area where employers are finding it increasingly difficult to recruit graduates with the right qualifications and skills. There is an increasing demand for skills, but also a significant gap between current business analytics course graduates’ analytical skills and employers’ needs.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
